item.title: Interpreter
item.description: INTRODUCTION Interpreter is the fourth box from HTB’s Season 10. It’s rated Medium difficulty, but ratings put it on the easier side of medium. It’s a bit of an oddball: you start the box with RCE (practically); besides fingerprinting the target web app, there’s no recon at all! The user flag is mostly an exercise in enumeration, reading through files, and understanding the target application: you’ll quickly find a password hash, but some additional technique must be applied to crack it.
